DOC.brief_summary: This study 8-week open-label trial test oxytocin nasal spray ( Syntocinon ) treatment social impairment adolescent autism spectrum disorder ( ASD ) . We hypothesize oxytocin nasal spray safe , tolerable , effective improve core symptom autism spectrum disorder adolescent age 11-17 .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label Trial Oxytocin Adolescents With Autism Spectrum Disorders
